title: Rebinding Keys for MAC?
body:
So I know there is some controversy over this, and sometimes even anger,  and I have found the PC version way to rebind the mouse click to the arrow keys...See Below....but I was hoping someone would help me apply this to Mac software.  

(input.ini, copy to CFG folder)
evtScrollUp = [Up Arrow]
evtScrollDown = [Down Arrow]
evtScrollLeft = [Left Arrow]
evtScrollRight = [Right Arrow]
 Credits to http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3212&page=1

And yes I like to use that method for moving best with the space bar as my attack selection, it makes it easier for a character to move quickly out of the line of fire and use spells with an surrounding area effect much easier while moving in a direction away from an enemy. I prefer it but am not saying it suits everyone. I have old school gaming preferences. And I tend to prefer support characters but please humor me and consider directing me by steps to achieve such a thing. With the new update all my old configurations have been deleted. 

Thank you!

{{champion:76}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:63}}

replies.body:
Seeing as the post you linked was back from 2009, those steps may not be 100% accurate anymore. I'd probably stick to adjusting your keybinds through the in-game settings. If you're having issues getting them to save correct, try a quick manual reset.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to your default installation
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
